text_digitalsignage: Want to change your screen into a digital signage channel to attract more clients? With Promobox you can promote your product easily and remotely.
comment1: “I saw Promobox devices in Casino. I want more!”
author1: Pjotr Zonin, technical specialist - Casino GrandPrix, IMG Kasiinod AS
comment2: “It works even better than Samsung system, which is well done too”.
author2: Anton Ossipov, IT-specialist - Enzo Cafe OÜ
comment3: “This is the most comfortable system I've ever used.”
author3: Pavel Vinogradov, IT-speсialist - Baltic Restaurants AS
how_it_work.title: This is how it works
how_it_work.p1: You can use Promobox device with any digital screen with HDMI input. Attach Promobox device to the screen and to the network. From now on you can add images, videos, music and webpages to your screen via Internet from anywhere. All you have to do is to log in to your Promobox user account and upload your files.
how_it_work.p3: Do not have quality screens yet? Contact us and ask for more.
spec.desc: The cloud-based Promobox enables you to manage the content of hundreds of screens remotely from one location.
spec.hdmi: Both audio and video uses HDMI out
spec.network: 10/100/1000 Ethernet RJ45 or wireless WiFi for network
features.p1: You can add any type of file and Promobox will prepare and convert it automatically.
features.p2: You can set up the duration of material demonstration and manage the time of start and finish.
features.p3: With Promobox all material on displays (or display groups) can be updated, edited and scheduled remotely from anywhere where there’s an Internet connection.
features.p4: Promobox is using SSL secured network connection and keeps on showing the uploaded material also offline. Promobox updates software automatically and in case of error Promobox will notifies you about that.
features.p5: Images (JPEG, PNG, PDF), full HD video (all video formats), RSS feeds (news, advertisement, etc.), web pages, text presentations and plays music.
features.p6: You don’t have to install an additional software; Promobox is working and managing via Internet browser.
started.p1: Order as many Promobox devices as you need, one for each screen you wish to use for digital signage.
started.p2: Promobox device with manual will be shipped to you within 2-4 weeks depending on destination.
started.p3: Use the manual to attach the device to your screens
started.p4: Log in to https://admin.promobox.ee with your email address and a password we’ve sent to you by e-mail. See the manual to know how to add material to screens
started.p5: Need help? Contact our tech support at support@promobox.ee
frequently.h2: I’m not big on technology. Am I able to start using Promobox without help?
frequently.p2: Yes, you can use the Promobox without any special IT skills. You just plug in the power, attach the Promobox to the screen with a HDMI cable (we’ll send you one for each device), and attach the Ethernet network cable.
frequently.h3: How long am I engaged to use the Promobox service?
frequently.p3: After a one month free trial you can stop using the Promobox or continue. You can rent Promobox for 15 € per month or buy it. Just send us an e-mail or make a call 3 days before the trial ends.
frequently.h4: The device is attached to the network. Is it safe to use Promobox?
frequently.p4: All data is SSL encrypted, which is absolutely safe.
frequently.h5: Will the screen go black if the Internet connection is down?
frequently.p5: The Promobox downloads the material to its own internal memory and plays it from there. The network is needed only when uploading new or editing old materials. After the network connection is back up the Promobox will automatically check if there’s new material or changes made to the Promobox system.
frequently.h6: Can I use a 3G or 4G connection to connect my screens to Internet?
frequently.p6: Yes, you can but you should be ready that you can’t connect the USB modem directly to the Promobox. You need a 3G router that you plug in to the Promobox with a cable. Also the data plans can be expensive because HD video and image material can be quite large.
pricing.1: An account to Promobox to manage content on screen(s)
pricing.3: Unlimited storage for videos and images
pricing.4: A connection to the scalable Promobox cloud server
pricing.11: You won’t get engaged to long-term agreements. The price includes a one month trial period.
pricing.h2: Contact us to get more info or individual offer
about-us.p1: Promobox OÜ was founded in 2014. Today the team consists of 5 people located in Tallinn, Estonia. Our digital signage products and services are used for different information, marketing and guidance needs in multiple different industries. Advertisements, offers, bulletins, price lists and lunch lists.
about-us.p2: The reliable and easy to use Promobox system is enjoyed by continuously growing group of satisfied customers like restaurants Enzo, Violet, Daily Special, casino GrandPrix, DPD delivery & electric SLO services and others.
